name: Escape Path Beta
description:
This is the Beta of the early development of a game called Escape Path.  This is the first version of full demo of the first environment/world the player will face in the game. Your feedback is crucially important to the development of a more polished and finished demo of the game, so thank you for playing the game and let me know what you think!

Escape Path is a roleplaying strategy game where the choices you make throughout the game will result in one of numerous endings, but there is only one way out. The gameplay is similar to a dungeon crawler, with turn based movement and procedurally generated rooms. But, there is a story element added to influence your decisions with humor and personalities to the characters. Which path will you take?

Note: This is only the beginning of your journey. No path escapes in this demo, but I did add endings just for the demo that represent the path you chose.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys: Move the character up and down or left and right. 

Enter or Return Key: Submit or continue dialogue. Also can be used to skip any of the intro to go right to the Start Screen. 

Shift Key: The dialogue is read off one letter at a time. You can increase or decrease the text speed in the options menu, or you can press Shift key to finish reading the text.

Escape key: Open the pause menu during the game. 

*Some keys with special functions will be explained in the game.
